website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quirks, these bookends have an eclectic style and enough heft to hold most types of books reasonably well.
pros: Not only do these bookends have an attractive human design, but they are also reasonably sturdy thanks to the stainless steel craftsmanship
cons: Padded bottoms are stable on most surfaces, but may slip on some
A few quality control issues have been reported, such as bent edges

customer_reviews.title: Well made bookends
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with these bookends. They are made of metal and are quite heavy. The base has some non-skid material so we are able to use these even on a metal shelf (see photo). I thought they would slip, but they don't. We are using these in our son's room. It is definitely not a toy, but we wanted something that he could use as he grows up. I see these lasting a good number of years. I would buy there again and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It looks amazing! Great conversation piece as well. Like yes, I got it from Amazon! Lol
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!!!! I just received it today and it looks fantastic. It holds my books perfectly. Perfect weight. It was also very well packed. Had plastic around it in order for it not to get scratches. The bottom has a velvety film to also prevent it from scratching any surfice. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LainieTuesday

customer_reviews.title: The end result: Your books will stay in place
customer_reviews.text: These stylized, heavy duty stainless steel bookends are the best I've ever owned. I needed bookends that would stay put and not slide around when I removed or put back the large cookbooks stored on the polished wooden shelf of my baker's rack. These two guys work perfectly. Not only do they have some weight to them but they have long bases for increased stability and the bottoms are coated with a non-slip material. Now, when I remove a book and its neighbors tip to fill the void, the bookends stay in place and keep the rest of the stack from collapsing. Fabulous and well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Ken G

customer_reviews.title: Just Beautiful (As far as bookends go!)
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for my new 2 shelf setup in my workout room. I had my 2 small components on the top shelf and wanted to display my DVD collection. But alas, they kept falling over. Looked at a few different bookends and these just looked cool. And they look even better in person! Heavy enough to hold up what you need, but not too heavy. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: S. Bachman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly Like the pic ....
customer_reviews.text: They feel & look sturdy , great bargain with a great look .... I'm very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Yadi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Stainless Steel Man Bookends
customer_reviews.text: I like the design, sturdiness and the quality of the bookends. I gave it four stars because the space between the hands and the platform prohibits the end books from sitting on the platform of the stand. One of the reviews that I read prior to ordering mentioned this gap; however, I wasn't clear on what the person was saying. I will keep the bookends, I just have to place few books in between the book ends.
customer_reviews.author: 2Carols

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Too light. Shorter than stated.
customer_reviews.text: I really can't believe all the rest of the good reviews for these bookends. I feel like they can't have received the same item as we did. These are worth maybe $12. NOT "heavy duty" at all- they weigh two pounds total, are shorter than stated, and are dented in spots. They look cheap. Will not be using.
customer_reviews.author: DAKB

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and good quality
customer_reviews.text: It is not flimsy or cheap. Each figure weighs one pound, good quality and very durable. The only thing I would mention is please take into consideration how many books you plan on putting inbetween the two bookends. Each figure has a long metal metal tab (tongue), so if you want to add two or three books (like in the image of the product) you can't because the tongues are too long, they would have to be side by side and thus different depths on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo A. Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Not Nonskid, Unsafe for Children's Room
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely not nonskid. We bought these to keep our baby's books together on her bookshelf. They were holding about 15 children's books between them. Whenever I went to take a book out, or if the books weren't perfectly, compactly stacked together, the bookends would start to slide. Last straw was when I couldn't hold all the books together after taking one out and they all fell on the floor. Not sure why they are called nonskid.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: At first I had trouble using it; it kept on sliding all the books. I was almost going to return it. I know there has been many 5-star reviews for this item. I could not understand what I was doing. I was going to give it a 1-star. But after looking at some of the reviews, I decided to give it another try before I returned it. After some trial and error, I found out that you can't place them in a line; you have to place them one next to the other. When I did this it held up the books. Real cool. I am glad I did not return it.
customer_reviews.author: Soudamini M. Nath

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent for my needs. Has a nice non skid pad under it and the weight of the book sits on the lip as well to help prevent it from sliding. Not super heavy but sufficient enough as it helps to give you the option to keep the books in a more "upright" position rather than leaned over.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dostie

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad...
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the book ends, which is why I purchased them. However, I did not realize until I started organizing my books on the shelf, that the bookends actually take up space! If you have a large space to work with, these bookends are not bad, but if your space is limited, they will eat up space where your books would have gone. Other than that, they are sturdy and pretty heavy duty. Price wise, I think they could be cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: msiee

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not skid free
customer_reviews.text: I tried and really wanted to love these bookends. They’re simple and cute. They are not skid free. Removing just one book makes all others shift, causing one bookend to slip out resulting in books on the floor. Used for our kid’s books. Maybe they’re not meant to support 12-18 books.
customer_reviews.author: Review123

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very FAST shipping! Delivered exactly as I promised. The description and picture of the book ends is exactly what you will get. I keep a small collection of unread books on my night stand. This organized them perfectly. The non slip material under the base a good and doesn't move on the wooden surface I have it on. I have nothing negative to say about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bookends!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect. They came in a small box but was surprised when I opened it they were not small at all. The size was how I envisioned them to be. They're heavy and do not skid. I placed them on my office table at home and held my books quite well. A beautiful display piece too. My wife loves them and now she wants one too! I'm planning to get the Kung Fu version which unfortunately is the only other one of the same style. Hopefully Fasmov makes more designs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but description is inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: They are not as tall as described. They are only 5.75" tall. The base of them is 7.25" long. My digital scale says they weigh combined 2 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for sharp edges of the bottom plate...
customer_reviews.text: Nonskid bottom + heavy weight definitely make these bookends useful. Watch out for the sharp edges of the bottom plate though- my daughter had her finger slightly cut. Since both bookends in the package were similar in terms of this rather ‘unfinished’ bottom plate, I guess this is not any related to my item being defective. Otherwise 5 stars, but cutting your finger from a bookend is not something acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Tae-Wook Koh

customer_reviews.title: Form meets function
customer_reviews.text: Great example of form meeting function. These are stylish, fun and practical. Bought 1 set as retirement gift for a colleague and 1 for me. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: contemporary chic

customer_reviews.title: Great! But take heed of size
customer_reviews.text: These are great little figurines but if you have a smaller bookshelf it will benefit you to notice that the figurines themselves take up quite a bit of space, probably the size of about 5 or 6 small books. They would work best on a larger bookshelf, or if you have a small collection.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bookends
customer_reviews.text: I like the humanoid figures holding up the books, looks cool. these are well made and great looking bookends that will last for quite some time. they are heavy for their size and the plating is well done. there is rubber or some such material under the pads so you don't scuff up the furniture. I would definitely recommend these if you like the figures.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: No Slide And Looks Cool!
customer_reviews.text: These things are great! They are big enough that they hold a lot of weight and don't slide back with the provided 'non-skid' backing on them. And they look cool at the same time! I liked them enough that I bought two sets...
customer_reviews.author: JMA

customer_reviews.title: These bookends look great holding up books
customer_reviews.text: These bookends look great holding up books, but they are very unstable. I had some heavy books between them, removed one book, and they toppled over. I would not recommend them for any but the lightest of books.
customer_reviews.author: SandraL

customer_reviews.title: Very unique
customer_reviews.text: The biggest issue for me was no soft undercoating. I had to add felt to the bottom so they would not scratch woodwork. They are very nice looking and heavy (sturdy) holders.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Great Book Ends
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to lighten up my book shelves. This was perfect. I was hesitant with the purchase before it arrived because it didnt' look sturdy. WRONG! They hold so well. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Hyunz

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I like having unique items in the office, and these fit in perfectly. They REALLY don't slide at all. I actually have to grab it and push it back if I'm adding a new book to the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Rajvir Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and feels sturdy/heavy, mirrored surface and delivered to me unscratched. Since buying them, I may or may not have evaluated the aesthetics of them but they look exactly like pictured and there's nothing to hold against them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ng

customer_reviews.title: WOW these are SO nice!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely happy with these book ends! They add so much character to my book shelf instead of those awful plain black metal ones. These are high quality, pleasing to the eye, and hold the book up!
customer_reviews.author: DIY Guy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute
customer_reviews.text: These are so great. I'm a teacher at a college and have heavy textbooks. These hold them up. And I get lots of comments on them. I live them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun book ends!
customer_reviews.text: Cool book ends! I'm not a reader at all, but have textbooks from current and previous classes that I need to keep nearby. I could keep them in a cabinet or standing upright on their own, but these add a touch of character and sleekness and add some detail to the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done but...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good condition and fairly heavy but they do tend to skid.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyandFiona1992

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great! And fun. They don’t slide around and are very unique. I may buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: I think they look awesome
customer_reviews.text: Honestly they just arrived and I haven't had a chance to use them but they look great I really think they're interesting looking! 😊 and the clear Chrome finish is gorgeous.... just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: I get compliments on this frequently :)
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and I use this to keep my reference books on my desk in good order. Holds heavy textbooks and gets a lot of notice by the kids :)
customer_reviews.author: Tech Palindrome

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of books! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and strong ! Exactly what I was looking for , to add some interesting decoration to my library! And holding my books from falling...
customer_reviews.author: reut

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: They look good but they will not stop heavy or a lot of books
customer_reviews.author: Ruthvija

customer_reviews.title: They will hold your books, look great, and not scratch your table.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I have approx 15 books between them, 7 of which are very large coffee table books. They look great, whimsical and artistic.
customer_reviews.author: Rine Bow

customer_reviews.title: They look wonderful on the top of our stainless steel rack in ...
customer_reviews.text: They look wonderful on the top of our stainless steel rack in the kitchen. Most of our heaviest cookbooks are sandwiched between these two beauties.These bookends are very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Young

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Aesthetic
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these for my husband's office. Nearly every client who sees them makes a very positive comment. They are so much nicer than standard book supports. :>)
customer_reviews.author: Miss Judy

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what the photos show. Very sturdy. Super cool and funny.
customer_reviews.text: They are not exactly as the photo portrays them to be, which makes me think I'm paying full price for slight nock-offs. They are super cute and make my bookshelf have some extra character. Sturdy enough to hold a while row of books up with no issues in the least. All in all a happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kimillian G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something unique for my desk and I’m so glad that I chose these. Very strong, great rubber bottom to help avoid sliding, very shiny, builds well.
customer_reviews.author: JSOlz

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I’m pleasantly surprised by the quality of these bookends. They’re very sturdy, have some heft, look nice and seem well made. I just received them so I can’t speak to how long they’ll last but I’m betting I’ll have them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Very neat
customer_reviews.text: I really love this! I needed something to hold my books upright because I was sick of staking them. Looks very cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Funk

customer_reviews.title: Stars Only For Style
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these. The ""sturdiness" is non-existent. I do not see any durability. The books on these bookends are not even heavy, and there is already a bend? Might be looking for replacements. These are not heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Mantha

customer_reviews.title: Look even nicer in person
customer_reviews.text: These are even better quality than I expected! They have a good weight to them, they are made well, look nice, and have a felt padding on the bottom so that they won't scuff your shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Working out great!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to hold up some of my heaviest books and they've been working wonderfully! I plan on getting more of the same when the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are very well made and very shiny. They look very expensive. I have many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Landon

customer_reviews.title: Holds-ish
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Used to hold up two partially filled one-inch binders. Once a binder is removed, the holder shifts. And all remaining items have to be Restacked.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves them!
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot nicer than the old tan book ends we were using. They give a nice modern look to your bookshelf!

customer_reviews.title: Happy "camper".
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like with these bookends. They fit into my industrial decor very well. They are heavy and hold the weight of the books very well. Highly recommend!!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and does what it supose to do., hold your books in place. My old bookend did not hold all my books.

customer_reviews.title: These book shelves are seriously stylish!
customer_reviews.text: These book shelves are seriously stylish! They function perfectly as well, but mainly they just look awesome! Simple as that

customer_reviews.title: It holds books upright....like book ends

customer_reviews.title: So nice looking!
